TutorialÂ¶

If this is your first time using the toolkit it is recommended to start by looking at the Getting Started tutorial, which will show you what’s needed to get the toolkit running.

After looking at the first tutorial it is recommended to familiarise yourself with the Simple widget as all widgets are inherited from this widget.

Then you should look at the other widgets and tutorials available as you need them.

  • Getting Started
  • Events
  • Theming
